/* thumbLabel */

.thumbsWrapper--ARhQa .thumbs--2nEfb li div {
        bottom: 0;
        font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        font-size: 11px;
        font-weight: 700;
        line-height: normal;
        opacity: 0.9;
        overflow: hidden;
        padding: 2px 4px;
        text-shadow: none;
        top: auto;
        -webkit-transform: none;
                transform: none;
        word-break: break-word;
        text-align: left;
        -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
                box-sizing: border-box;
        left: 0;
        position: absolute;
        white-space: normal;
        width: 100%;
      }
